description: Giant hyssop (Agastache 'Pink Pop') is an amazing plant species that is sure to add amazing colour and texture to your garden. This plant has tall spikes of pink blooms that open from summer to autumn and attract butterflies and bees. It's aromatic foliage is a pleasant minty-anise scent and the stems are covered in long, narrow, fuzzy leaves. It's a great feature for rock gardens, containers, and roadway plantings, growing up to two feet in height and width. With good drainage and full sun, it will thrive and mesmerise you with its stunning show.
